title: Culinary Chronicles
description: An app for foodies to create and share recipes with others! Built with ReactJS, NodeJS, Graphql, expressJS, Shoelace CSS and MongoDB

title: Cyriously In Japan
description: An app to help people learn basic Japanese, and plan their trip to Japan. Built using ReactJS, SASS, Firebase, and Google Maps.

title: Card Wise
description: A browser-based study app that allows users to create and share decks of study cards. Built using Handlebars, ExpressJS, Mysql, Sequelize, and Nodejs.

title: DogFinder
description: An app designed to help people find the perfect dog. Built with HTML, Javascript and Shoelace for the front end. NodeJS, and express for the back end.
